tool_description: Identifies seasonal patterns and cyclical trends in return behavior across different time periods and events.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs spanning multiple seasons

pattern_granularity.description: Granularity for pattern detection: monthly, weekly, daily

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Minimum 100 returns required for seasonal pattern detection
Invalid pattern granularity: Use one of [monthly, weekly, daily]
Time span inadequate: Data must span at least 12 months for seasonal analysis
usage: Provide return_ids with sufficient historical data to detect seasonal patterns. Set pattern_granularity to control the detail level of pattern detection.

seasonal_peaks.description: Time periods with highest return activity

cyclical_patterns.description: Description of identified cyclical return patterns

seasonality_strength.description: Strength of seasonal patterns from 0 to 1
